entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing late this evening. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 6.
